resources.string: I am Karla Mae G. Alo-ot, a 20 years old who loves editing videos and designing UI/UX. I am passionate about creating user centered designs that combine functionality and aesthetics.
Hola! Me llamo Christine Marie B. Amarille. Tengo 20 anos. I am a curious and thoughtful person who loves learning about different topics, from technology and programming to ethics.
Aspiring IT professional with a passion for innovation and problem-solving through technology.
Dedicated backend developer skilled in database management and application logic design.

I am Pau, a 3rd year IT student and passionate about developing innovative solutions and exploring new technologies. Also, an active leader that leads with passion and commitment to fostering a better community I lead.
